Package image.color

Class GrayColor

java.lang.Object
image.color.GrayColor
public class GrayColor extends Object
The GrayColor class represents a grayscale color. It provides methods to get and set the gray level and alpha transparency of the color.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final GrayColor
    BLACK
    Constant representing the black color with a gray level of 0.
    static final GrayColor
    WHITE
    Constant representing the white color with a gray level of 255.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this GrayColor object to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a GrayColor object with the same gray level and alpha transparency as this GrayColor object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare this GrayColor against
      Returns:
      true if the given object represents a GrayColor equivalent to this GrayColor, false otherwise
